Container.Name: joal
Container.Overview:
JOAL is not designed to help or encourage you downloading illegal materials ! You must respect the law applicable in your country. I couldn't be held responsible for illegal activities performed by your usage of JOAL.
How to access to WebUI :
Once joal is started head to: http://IP:PORT/SECRET_OBFUSCATION_PATH/ui/. SECRET_OBFUSCATION_PATH has default value : "joaleeS8efie". This must contains only alphanumeric characters (no slash, backslash, or any other non-alphanum char)

Config.Name: Timezone
Config.Description: This variable is not mandatory and specifies the timezone to be configured within the container. It has default value Europe/Brussels.

Config.Name: Path prefix
Config.Description: Once joal is started head to: http://localhost:port/SECRET_OBFUSCATION_PATH/ui/. It has default value joaleeS8efie. This must contains only alphanumeric characters (no slash, backslash, or any other non-alphanum char)

Config.Name: Secret TOKEN
Config.Description: Secret token here (this is some kind of a password, choose a complicated one). It has default value eikoogei8yohphaph6eiza3EraaChav2jee8lood9iegaing

Config.Name: Port Joal
Config.Description: This variable is not mandatory and specifies on which port joal should listen. It has default value 3965.

Config.Name: Auto Upgrade
Config.Description: This variable is not mandatory and specifies if the container has to launch software update at startup or not. Valid values are 0 and 1. It has default value 0.
